data.prayer: Spirit, help get online Bibles and Bible apps onto the phones of the 128,288 people who claim to know you, so they can read everyday.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Lapland, Finland

data.prayer: Father, knowing that teachers will be judged more strictly, help the local leaders in Lapland, Finland to be careful with their words.
data.verse: Not many of you should become teachers, my brothers, for you know that we who teach will be judged with greater strictness.

data.section_summary: On average, 15 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who might know about God culturally, but likely have no relationship with Jesus in Lapland, Finland.
data.prayer: Lord, reveal yourself to these new families.
Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in Lapland, Finland.
Father, encourage the 18,669 believers to have boldness before you, since they have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus the Son of God.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Japanese people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Spirit, help the church in the state of Lapland do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

data.prayer: Father, help media producers communicate the gospel in a way that is understandable to the people of Lapland, Finland.
data.verse: But from there, you will seek the LORD your God, and you will find Him if you search for Him with all your heart and all your soul.

data.prayer: Father, help your children in Lapland, Finland find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

location.name: Lapland
location.people_groups_list: South Asian, Bengali-speaking, Nepalese, Thai, Moroccan, Arabic-speaking, Jew, Finnish-speaking
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: South Asian, Bengali-speaking (1,500), Nepalese (3,900), Thai (7,000), Moroccan, Arabic-speaking (1,000), Jew, Finnish-speaking (1,300)
